      Overrides:
      start in class AppointmentAddController

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the scene by setting up the combo boxes with importing customer, contact information, and updating appointment details.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Overrides:
      initialize in class AppointmentAddController

    • customerImport

      private void customerImport()
      This method selects the customer in the combo box that matches the customerID of the updateAppointment. It goes through each item in the combo box to find the match.

    • contactImport

      private void contactImport()
      This method selects the contact in the contact combo box that matches the contactID of the updateAppointment.

    • updateAppointmentImport

      private void updateAppointmentImport()
      This method imports the details of the updateAppointment and sets the corresponding fields in the scene. Added formatting so that I could continue to use my combo boxes for hours and minutes.

    • setContactID

      private void setContactID()
      This method sets the contactID to the contactID of the selected contact in the combo box.

    • updateAppointmentButton

      private void updateAppointmentButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is triggered when the updateAppointmentButton is clicked. It validates the inputs, creates an Appointment, calls the updateAppointment method to update the appointment in the database, and then clears the form. I also moved logic in here to exlude this appointment from overlapping itself by using the ID to exclude it.
      Throws:
      IOException
